de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics

Interface GameCamera

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Resizeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VectorGameCamera

    public interface GameCamera
extends Resizeable
    Tracks a camera and make it following a target
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void focus()
      Focuses directly on the target
      void focus(GameObject object)
      When no target is defined or the given object is the target, it focuses the game camera onto the given object.
      float getBaseZoom()
      Provides the current base zoom
      com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Camera getInternal()
      Provides the internal camera
      void setBaseZoom(float zoom)
      Sets the base zoom
      void setSpeed(float speed)
      Sets a new speed value
      void setStickToWorldBounds(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables the camera to stick to the current GameWorld bounds.
      void setTarget(GameObject target)
      Sets a new target.
      void setTarget(GameObject target, boolean focus)
      Sets a new target and determines if focus or not.
      void setZoomScale(float zoomScale)
      Sets a new zoom scale factor
      void update(float delta)
      Updates the tracker in a frame step
      void zoom(float amount)
      Zooms the current baseZoom.

      • Methods inherited from interface de.bitbrain.braingdx.util.Resizeable

        resize

      • setStickToWorldBounds

        void setStickToWorldBounds(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables the camera to stick to the current GameWorld bounds. By default this is enabled.

        Provides the current base zoom

        Zooms the current baseZoom.
        Parameters:
        amount - the base zoom amount

      • focus

        Focuses directly on the target

      • focus

        void focus(GameObject object)
        When no target is defined or the given object is the target, it focuses the game camera onto the given object.

      • setTarget

        void setTarget(GameObject target)
        Sets a new target. Focuses by default.
        Parameters:
        target - the target

      • setTarget

        void setTarget(GameObject target,
             boolean focus)
        Sets a new target and determines if focus or not.
        Parameters:
        target - the target
        focus - focus target on attach
